style: Travel guide, cosmic humor, Hitchhiker's Guide, dry wit

metadata.creator: Community Theme Pack
metadata.inspiration: Lonely Planet Guides, Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, travel humor

sandbox.context: The immediate computing environment you're exploring

error.context: Something on this world is broken and can't be visited

warning.context: Important information before you proceed to explore

success.context: Successfully navigated to your goal location

status.context: Where are you in your journey? What's happening here?

progress.context: How far along your expedition are you?

debug_mode.context: Detailed information about this location's mechanics

cache.context: Souvenirs and memories from previous visits

log_file.context: Complete record of your journey and explorations

process_queue.context: The places you plan to visit, in order

memory_usage.context: How much of your travel capacity is used

file_system.context: The territories and locations available to explore

network.context: Connection to distant worlds and systems

security_check.context: Confirming you have permission to enter this location

backup.context: Redundant copies of your journey records

update.context: New information about a location has arrived

initialization.context: Launching your journey to new worlds

shutdown.context: Setting up camp for the evening

timeout.context: Couldn't reach the destination in time

overflow.context: Tried to carry too much; system capacity exceeded

permission_denied.context: You lack the credentials to enter this location

file_not_found.context: This location doesn't appear on any map

connection_error.context: Can't establish transport to the destination

configuration.context: Your personal journey settings and accommodations

data_validation.context: Verifying the destination exists and is safe

optimization.context: Finding the fastest path between locations
